title: There Was a Bold Lady Who Wanted a Star
description: There was a bold lady who wanted a star,I don't know why she wanted a star, it seemed too far...In this funny, clever adaptation of the classic song "There Was an Old Lady Who Swallowed a Fly," Charise Mericle Harper takes readers on a wacky journey as a feisty, bold lady tries everything from skates, to a bike, to a car to reach a star. Children will love poring over all the details in Harper's magical illustrations.
author: Charise Mericle Harper
